name: The Yearning Tree
description:
A quiet space for you.

The Yearning Tree is a work in Unity3D WebGL. It is free to experience, and can be played in your browser immediately here: https://ocias.com/games/the-yearning-tree/

Estimated play time: 2 minutes.

A game by Alex Ocias with audio by Stefano Guzzetti. Built in Unity3D for WebGL.
